/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out ahead, disappearing into the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
